name: Curry-Coconut Shrimp
author: dakota kelly
summary: Jumbo shrimp in a lightly spiced coconut curry sauce. Serve over hot cooked brown rice.
ingredients: ½ cup minced red bell pepper
¼ teaspoon crushed red pepper flakes
1 pound jumbo shrimp, peeled and deveined
directions: Heat oil in large, nonstick saucepan over medium heat
Saute onion, red pepper, and garlic until vegetables begin to soften, about 3 minutes
Season with cumin, coriander, and curry powder
Stir in coconut milk, sugar, and crushed red pepper flakes
Reduce heat, and simmer, uncovered for 2 minutes
Stir in shrimp, and increase heat to medium-high
Cook and stir until shrimp is cooked through, about 4 minutes
In a small bowl, combine cornstarch with 1 tablespoon water
Stir into shrimp mixture, and cook until sauce has thickened, about 1 minute
Stir in cilantro, and remove from heat
